manualRefund.comment: Allow refunding items used to craft the manual

MachineSoundVolume.comment: Machines crafting sound volume (0 - disabled, 1 - max)

vanillaUnlockRecipes.comment: Enable recipe unlocks only with vanilla mechanic, instead of getting all of them at once

IC2TransformersStyle.comment: Input from dots side, output from other sides, like in IC2.

enabled.comment: Should the nuke explode, set to false to prevent block damage

saptime.comment: How long it takes to harvest one sap (ticks)

SapCheckTime.comment: How often to check for sap (will check if world time % this number is zero)

uninsulatedElectrocutionSound.comment: When true an uninsulated cable will create a spark sound when an entity touches it

uninsulatedElectrocutionDamage.comment: When true an uninsulated cable will cause damage to entities

uninsulatedElectrocutionParticles.comment: When true an uninsulated cable will create a spark when an entity touches it
